instructions.title: How To Delete Your Hulu Account Attached To Spotfiy
instructions.before: You can Cancel your Hulu Subscription Attached to your Spotify Account without Deleting Your Premium Spotify Subscription.  This cannot be completed from within the mobile app, you must delete it from a computer browser.
instructions.after: Once your Hulu is cancelled you still have to go through and cancel your premium Spotify and Free Spotify to permanently delete your account.

qnAnswers.question: Do I lose access to my music if I cancel my premium Spotify account?
qnAnswers.answer: Yes.  As soon as your premium subscription is cancelled, you will not have access to any offline content you downloaded when you had premium, since offline playlists are a premium only feature. You can however stream those tracks from Spotify again if you are online. But you won't lose any playlists, friends, or your music library, as long as you keep using the same username you've been using. Those are independent from your subscription status.

qnAnswers.question: Is it possible to use Spotify without facebook?
qnAnswers.answer: Yes.  You do not have to be connected to facebook to use Spotify.  To disconnect facebook and stop sharing your data just go to your settings and under the social category Click Disconnect Facebook.

qnAnswers.question: Can I Cancel Hulu through Spotify Without Canceling my Premium Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Yes.  You can cancel Hulu and keep your premium spotify account.

instructions.title: How To Delete Your Spotify Premium Subscription Account

If you have a Spotify Premium Account you must cancel it before you delete your entire Spotify account. To Delete you Paid Spotify Subscription Account please follow the steps below.
instructions.after: Once your subscription is cancelled, you now have to delete your free account to complete the deletion process.
